text: 1:7 Jop 23:10; Onger Akaba 66:10; Aghuzir Akaba 17:3; Aisaia 48:10; Sekaraia 13:9; Malakai 3:3; Rom 2:7; 2:10; Jems 1:3Arazir kamɨn God ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavibar gan fogham, ia guizbangɨra nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an iti, o puvatɨ. E fo, gol a bizir aghuim, eghtɨ me avimɨn a tuaghɨva, a gɨfogham, a guizɨn gol, o puvatɨ. Gol a gɨvaghamin bizim. Ezɨ en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim bar gol gafira. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, arazaraziba ia bativtɨ ia fogh, ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn iti. Eghtɨ dughiar Krais Iesus ua izamim, a bar ia gakueghɨva, ian ziaba fɨva ziar ekiaba ia danɨngam.
